languages.text: {n}Из динамика сервитора доносится мешанина звуков, словно глубокий старик, забывший речь, пытается выговорить ставшие незнакомыми слова. Затем в визорах вдруг вспыхивает искра, и с огромным напряжением он выговаривает:{/n} "Исполняю... функцию... все резервные мощности... задействованы... на исполнении главной функции".

{n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."
languages.original_text: {n}Из динамика сервитора доносится мешанина звуков, словно глубокий старик, забывший речь, пытается выговорить ставшие незнакомыми слова. Затем в визорах вдруг вспыхивает искра, и с огромным напряжением он выговаривает:{/n} "Исполняю... функцию... все резервные мощности... задействованы... на исполнении главной функции".

traits.locale_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who had outlived his faculty of speech, were trying to utter once-familiar words that were now strangers to him. Then suddenly a spark lights up in his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... my function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing the primary function."

{n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who had outlived his faculty of speech, were trying to utter once-familiar words that were now strangers to him. Then suddenly a spark lights up in his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... my function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing the primary function."

Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

{n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

{n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターのスピーカーから、ガチャガチャした雑音が聞こえてくる。まるで言語能力を失って長生きしている老人が、かつて親しんだ言葉を今では知らぬ言葉として口に出そうとするかのようだ。突然、サーヴィターのバイザーから火花が上がり、ひどく緊張した様子で声を発した。{/n}「機能を…実行…全予備容量を…使用し…初期機能を実行」
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターのスピーカーから、ガチャガチャした雑音が聞こえてくる。まるで言語能力を失って長生きしている老人が、かつて親しんだ言葉を今では知らぬ言葉として口に出そうとするかのようだ。突然、サーヴィターのバイザーから火花が上がり、ひどく緊張した様子で声を発した。{/n}「機能を…実行…全予備容量を…使用し…初期機能を実行」

languages.text: {n}机仆的音阵装置传出模糊的声响，仿佛一位已经失去了说话能力的老人，正试图说出他曾熟悉的陌生话语。突然，一串火花闪过，照亮了他的面甲，他非常努力地开了口。{/n}“执行……功能……所有的备用内存……已被占用……以执行主要职能。”
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工的音阵传出模糊的声响，仿佛一位已经失去了说话能力的老人，正试图说出他曾熟悉的陌生话语。突然，一串火花闪过，照亮了他的面甲，他非常努力地开了口。{/n}“执行……功能……所有的备用内存……已被占用……以执行主要职能。”

languages.text: {n}Le vox du servitor produit une série de sons inarticulés, comme quelqu'un qui essaierait de prononcer des mots après avoir perdu la faculté de parler depuis des années. D'un seul coup, son viseur s'illumine et il parvient à prononcer, quoiqu'avec grande difficulté :{/n} « Exécution... de la... fonction... Exploitation... de toutes les capacités en réserve... pour exécuter... la fonction primaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox du servitor produit une série de sons inarticulés, comme quelqu'un qui essaierait de prononcer des mots après avoir perdu la faculté de parler depuis des années. D'un seul coup, son viseur s'illumine et il parvient à prononcer, quoiqu'avec grande difficulté :{/n} « Exécution... de la... fonction... Exploitation... de toutes les capacités en réserve... pour exécuter... la fonction primaire. »

languages.text: {n}El altavoz del servidor reproduce una mezcla de sonidos, como si un hombre muy anciano, tras perder la capacidad de habla, intentara pronunciar palabras que antes sabía y ahora desconoce. De repente, un destello de luz ilumina sus visores y pronuncia con gran esfuerzo:{/n} «Función... de ejecución... todas las capacidades de reserva... activadas... para ejecutar la función primaria».
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}El altavoz del servidor reproduce una mezcla de sonidos, como si un hombre muy anciano, tras perder la capacidad de habla, intentara pronunciar palabras que antes sabía y ahora desconoce. De repente, un destello de luz ilumina sus visores y pronuncia con gran esfuerzo:{/n} «Función... de ejecución... todas las capacidades de reserva... activadas... para ejecutar la función primaria».

languages.text: {n}Ein Gewirr aus Geräuschen ertönt aus dem Lautsprecher des Servitors. Als würde ein sehr alter Mann, des Sprechens schon nicht mehr fähig, noch einmal versuchen, einst vertraute Wörter zu äußern. Dann plötzlich erhellt ein Funke seine Visoren und er stößt mit großer Mühe aus:{/n} "Funktion ... wird ausgeführt ... Alle Reservekapazitäten ... mit Ausführung von ... Primärfunktion ... beschäftigt."
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Gewiss aus Geräuschen ertönt aus dem Lautsprecher des Servitors. Als würde ein sehr alter Mann, des Sprechens schon nicht mehr fähig, noch einmal versuchen, einst vertraute Wörter zu äußern. Dann plötzlich erhellt ein Funke seine Visoren und er stößt mit großer Mühe aus:{/n} "Funktion ... wird ausgeführt ... Alle Reservekapazitäten ... mit Ausführung von ... Primärfunktion ... beschäftigt."

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün hoparlöründen düzensiz birtakım sesler geliyor. Sanki konuşma yetisini kaybetmiş, çok yaşlı bir adam; bir zamanlar bildiği ama artık ona yabancı gelen bazı sözler söylemeye çalışıyor. Vizörlerinde bir ışık çakmasıyla birlikte kendisini zorlayarak konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Fonksiyon. Başlatılıyor. Tüm yedek kapasiteler. Birincil fonksiyonları çalıştırmak adına. Faal."
languages.original_text: {n}A jumble of sounds comes from the servitor's speaker, as if a very old man, who has outlived his faculty of speech, is trying to utter once-familiar words now strange to him. Then suddenly, a spark lights up his visors, and he utters with great strain,{/n} "Executing... function... all reserve capacities... engaged... in executing primary function."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetörün hoparlöründen düzensiz bazı sesler geliyor. Sanki konuşma yetisini kaybetmiş çok yaşlı bir adam, bir zamanlar bildiği ama artık ona çok yabancı gelen bazı sözler söylemeye çalışıyor gibi. Ardından vizörlerinde bir ışık çakıyor ve kendisini zorlayarak konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Fonksiyon. Başlatılıyor. Tüm yedek kapasiteler. Birincil fonksiyonları çalıştırmak adına. Faal."
